title: Hospital visitation policy and extension of authority to reciprocal beneficiaries
context: [ยง323-2] Hospital visitation policy and extension of authority to reciprocal beneficiaries. A reciprocal beneficiary, as defined in chapter 572C, of a patient shall have the same rights as a spouse with respect to visitation and making health care decisions for the patient. [L 1997, c 383, ยง3]
